column1: Table 140-09003 : 2009/10 Household Expenditure Survey - Average Monthly Household Expenditure by Commodity/Service Section/Group by Type of Housing
Food, excluding meals bought away from home (i.e. groups 2-27)
28. Rent, including rates and government rent
29. Management fees and other housing charges
33. Liquefied petroleum gas and other fuel
56. Watches, clocks, cameras and optical goods
70. Purchases of and repairs to motor vehicles
72. Motor licences, insurance, instructor's fees, parking fees and tunnel tolls
91. Repairs to personal and household goods
92. Professional services, subscriptions and other services

(a) The Household Expenditure Survey (HES) is conducted once every five years to collect up-to-date information on the expenditure patterns of households in Hong Kong for updating the expenditure weights used for compiling the Consumer Price Index. The 2009/10 HES was conducted during the period from October 2009 to September 2010.
(b) Figures may not add up to totals due to rounding.

(c) Group 81 “School fees” covers “Kindergarten”, “Primary”, “Secondary”, “Project Yi Jin, craft and technician level”, “Post-secondary (including distance learning)”, “Private, vocational”, “Language courses” and “Other courses”. “Tuition schools and expenses on tuition” is also included.
(d) Statistics on medical expenses are subsumed in group 59 “Proprietary medicines and supplies” and group 83 “Medical services”.
